    • update

      public void update(double deltaTime)
      Updates the projectile's state If the projectile moves off the screen, it is destroyed
      Specified by:
      update in interface IGameObject
      Overrides:

      Parameters:
      deltaTime - The time elapsed since the last update, in seconds

    • shouldCollide

      public boolean shouldCollide(Entity other)
      Determines whether the projectile should collide with another entity Projectiles do not collide with entities of the same type that shot them (player or enemy)
      Overrides:
      shouldCollide in class Entity
      Parameters:
      other - The other entity
      Returns:
      True if the projectile should collide
